puzzle.title: Title
puzzle.hint: You'll want to fill in each numbered area with a basic color from the key below.
All the colors are either black or white (which you leave unfilled)
For the remaining numbers, take the first letter of each number's color
The solutio is THE COSTUME DEPT.
